testcase.name: SmartCredit report Importing Validation
testcase.system-out: Given user open Browser.....................................................passed Then user is on login page..................................................passed When user enter username and password.......................................passed Then user click on Login button.............................................passed Then user is on Home Page And validate title................................passed When user click on Add newClient Button.....................................passed Then user is on Add NewClient page..........................................passed When user enter firstname and lastname......................................passed When user click on client has no email......................................passed When user click on submit button............................................passed Then user should see warning message........................................passed When user click on ok button................................................passed Then user should see Client Dashboard page..................................passed When user click on 1-click import and audit.................................passed Then user should see Enter&confirm credit monitoring access details page....passed When user click on dropdown and select SmartCredit..........................passed When user enter username and password and security word.....................passed When user click on import run and simple audit..............................passed
